channel.title: Editing EXP at dummies
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]i see the exp but i cant change it =\ if i want to change the exp how do i change it?[/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 04:30:27 PM[/size][hr]help plz[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 04:33:55 PM[/size][hr]no ones helpin me

item.title: Editing EXP at dummies
item.dc:creator: @Br0kZ Br0kZ
item.description:
@Br0kZ wrote:

freekattack:

[glow=red,2,300]i see the exp but i cant change it =\ if i want to change the exp how do i change it?[/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 04:30:27 PM[/size][hr]help plz[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 04:33:55 PM[/size][hr]no ones helpin me

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the dummy."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((#*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((#*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((#*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;

Just edit the #'s.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing EXP at dummies
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Search for Dummy & change the XP numbers. Compile & save.

Nuffs’ Said.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing EXP at dummies
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. Simple. Search for “dummy” till you get see it says the message it says when you hit it. Then, where it shows the * and then a number, the number after the * is the amount of exp given. The [0] and other numbers are the skill ids.

Read full topic
